job_tasks.phrase: Create and improve autonomous support platforms using LLMs.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core task of building and enhancing software platforms, which is a fundamental software engineering activity. The use of LLMs indicates the integration of AI into these platforms.

job_tasks.phrase: This includes not only development but also troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools based on user feedback and support tickets.
job_tasks.justification: These are all standard software engineering responsibilities related to the lifecycle management of software tools and platforms.

job_tasks.phrase: One example would be creating an assistant able to guide customers through an upgrade process.
job_tasks.justification: Creating an assistant, even one powered by AI, is a software development task focused on building a functional tool or feature.

job_tasks.phrase: Test and integrate state-of-the-art AI technologies, like GPT-4 Vision and Amazon CodeWhisperer
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the process of testing and integrating external AI technologies into the company's systems, a core software integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: while providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows.
job_tasks.justification: Providing support and guidance to internal teams on technology usage falls under communication and collaboration skills.

job_tasks.phrase: Evaluate and enhance the performance and integration of AI solutions across different infrastructures, notably AWS
job_tasks.justification: This task involves assessing and improving the technical performance and integration of AI solutions, which are software engineering responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: and ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues, focusing on maintaining high service quality and satisfaction.
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring availability and maintaining service quality for end-users relates to the operational aspects of software development and support.

job_tasks.phrase: Improve support for both internal and external clients, significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity and service quality
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the business impact and strategic goals of the role, focusing on improving client support and boosting innovation capacity.

soft_skills.phrase: providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows.
soft_skills.justification: This task requires effective communication and collaboration to help internal teams adopt and use new AI technologies.

profile.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes core software engineering tasks such as creating, developing, testing, integrating, troubleshooting, and maintaining platforms and tools that utilize LLMs. While Generative AI technologies (LLMs, GPT-4 Vision) are central to the functionality, the role's focus is on the software engineering aspects of integrating and managing these AI components into business solutions, rather than deep AI model development or specialized prompt engineering. This aligns with the definition of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer, who builds or maintains software that directly uses AI/ML features as a core part of its functionality.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is clear and detailed regarding the responsibilities, technologies, and the nature of the work, allowing for a confident classification of the role and its associated tasks and technologies.
